name: funkin-script-autocompleter
description: AutoCompleter for Friday Night Funkin` scripts

funkinVSCode.engine.description:
Which Friday Night Funkin' Engine Lua Script API will this extension autocomplete.
Requires Restart/Reload to take effect.

funkinVSCode.data.description: Path to the local folder containing all of the API Data for the different engines.

funkinVSCode.onlineDataURL.description: URL path to the online folder which contains all of the API Data for the different engines.

funkinVSCode.enableOnlyOnCertainScripts.description: If checked, this extension will only work if a Lua script contains '---@funkinScript' comment

funkinVSCode.eventDocumentationGeneratio.description: If checked, after entering a event function, placeholder arguments are inserted on top of the function

funkinVSCode.functionArgumentsGeneration.description: If checked, after entering a call function, default values of arguments are inserted inside of the function

funkinVSCode.offlineMode.description: If checked, the completion data will no longer update with the online iteration

funkinVSCode.haxeEnabled.description:
If checked, haxe completion will be enabled for V-Slice (EXPERIMENTAL)
Requires Restart/Reload to take effect.

funkinVSCode.hscriptFileExtension.description: The associating file extension for Friday Night Funkin' scripts (EXPERIMENTAL)

funkinVSCode.haxelibs.description:
The Haxelibs you want to use
Requires VSCode Restart to take effect! (EXPERIMENTAL)

commands.title: Clear Cache for Engine API Data (EXPERIMENTAL)
Update Haxelibs for Funkin Scripts (Excluding Funkin Lib) (EXPERIMENTAL)
